nodes.text: In August of 2012, Galactic Passports were available at Celebration VI. The Galactic Passport was available at the Scholastic booth, and had pages promoting various publishers, including Dark Horse Comics, Del Rey, Dorling Kindersley, and Workman Publishing Company, Inc. Only the inside front cover and the first two pages were written from an in-universe perspective. The "visas," however, were in relation to the publishing companies.

The inside front cover and the first page utilized both Aurebesh and the High Galactic alphabet, and the individual visa stamps were also written in Aurebesh. The passports themselves were "issued" by the Galactic Empire and "registered" with the Imperial Space Ministry. These passports promoted the first annual Star Wars Reads Day event that occurred on October 6.
